attributes.action: Stop the Dale Farm Eviction in Essex
attributes.additional_details:
To stop the served eviction of dale farm and allow the travellers to stay on there bought land.
400 people are thought to live in the 51 plots that are in the farm. Althought they have not applied for planning permission they have bought the land.  If evicted these travellers will not have any areas designated to go. This could mean hundreds of travellers moving on to areas that are not appropriate or designated.
 Please sign the petition for the travellers to stay. They have bought the land and this is there home.
